title: Piano Sonata Op.07 No.1 'Derpy'

comments.body: Sean, I have heard your music before many times on here, and thought you say you dont think it doesnt sound all that great disagree. Why? Cause I'm an amateur singer. I have been singing for 5 years now and I have performed in many talent shows and won many awards. Though I'm not a professional, I know good music and good voices when i hear it. And you my friend have both^^
